list.title: CameraManager
list.description: Video element is the video input Canvas element is where video stream is being output Listens for camera input, has default width of 300

list.title: CameraManager#applyLiveFilter
list.description: Inputs a filtermanager class and name for a filter, gets the filter and applys to canvas

list.title: CameraManager#capturePhoto
list.description: Takes photo and draws to canvas

list.title: CameraManager#clearCanvas
list.description: canvas gets cleared

list.title: CameraManager#getDimensions
list.description: Returns canvas and video dimensions

list.title: CameraManager#isStreaming
list.description: Checks if the stream is on

list.title: CameraManager#requestPermissions
list.description: Listens for permissions and upon getting media, the stream is set as camera input

list.title: CameraManager#setupVideoListener
list.description: If the camera is not streaming, set height using aspect ratio and width and adjust video and canvas element

list.title: CameraManager#stopCamera
list.description: stop camera stream

list.title: Filter
list.description: Create a filter with a name and display name for the select input form type as in CSS or js function value for css value (grayscale : 1)

list.title: Filter#applyFilter
list.description: Apply filter to camera Source is camera input Canvas is where the output is being displayed Width and Height are the dimensions of the output

list.title: FilterFunctions
list.description: Filter functions named so far are eightbit and ASCII

list.title: FilterManager#addFilter
list.description: Creates a new instance of the filter class

list.title: FilterManager#applyFilterByName
list.description: Gets an input stream and output and applys the filter function

list.title: FilterManager#getAllFilters
list.description: Returns an array of all filters

list.title: FilterManager#getFilter
list.description: Gets a filter by name

list.title: StorageManager
list.description: create an instance of the manager class with a key for local storage

list.title: StorageManager#clearAll
list.description: clears local storage

list.title: StorageManager#getAllPhotos
list.description: Returns all photos from local storage

list.title: StorageManager#getPhotoCount
list.description: Returns number of images in local storage

list.title: StorageManager#getPhotosSlice
list.description: Gets a range of photos starting at a specific index

list.title: StorageManager#savePhoto
list.description: Adds the image to local storage

list.title: filterManager
list.description: Sets up buttons and managers

list.title: initializeFilters
list.description: Sets up filters from manager and fills select form

list.title: updateGalleryView
list.description: Gets pictures from local storage and adds to gallery, using the index and slice size to slide view
